snippet: Protesters are legally challenging a proposed ordinance that would limit public nudity in San Francisco.
abstract: Several dozen nudists are legally challenging proposed ordinance that would limit public nudity in San Francisco; under law, first-time citation for nudity would result in fine of up to $100, and subsequent citations would result in higher fines.
lead_paragraph: Protesters are legally challenging a proposed ordinance that would limit public nudity in San Francisco.

headline.seo: Nudists Challenge Ordinance Limiting Nudity in San Francisco
headline.main: Nudists Seek to Protect Right to Bare Everything
headline.print_headline: Nudists Seek to Protect Right to Bare Everything
